text:
The `clean' rule in ServerRoot/conf/ssl.crt/Makefile is too aggressive.  It
should   only remove the hash symlinks.  However, it can remove certificate
files as well.  For example, a cert named `foo.2006.crt' would be removed by
`clean'.
creator: srevilak@runwaynine.com
